segments.text: I keep coming back to the woman at the sink, and her composure is just baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is diligently drying her plate, completely unaware of the flood she's standing in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is absolute, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the water around her ankles?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely surprised by this level of oblivion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost makes me angry to see such a clear and present danger go unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to tell her what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are also causing trouble just behind her, stealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is a powder keg waiting for a spark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her lack of reaction is almost infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems she's in her own little world, completely detached.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at her to look down.
segments.speaker: PAR
